ygData.subject: Re: Ak'Anon king
ygData.msgSnippet: With all this discussion going on, I had to see if I could resolve it.  So I did.  Our King IS a gnome, as I discovered when I dispelled his strange desire to
ygData.messageBody:
With all this discussion going on, I had to see if I could resolve it. So I
did. Our King IS a gnome, as I discovered when I dispelled his strange
desire to look like a regular human. He was quick to put his disguise back
on however, and I am curious as to why...

End of discussion, IMHO

Cogg - Rallos Zek

----- Original Message -----
From: James Adams <jwa@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 12:37 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Ak'Anon king


> From: James Adams <jwa@...>
>
> Ever since retail release I have been wondering about this and bugging
> gms for an explanation. I can not remember a time when Akanon was not a
> SMALL human. The only guide to give any explanation said (opinion only,
> he/she remembered him being a small human since retail as well) that
> maybe Verant was waiting for something worthy of a King...Who knows.
> Someone I know went in and killed him once, so I'll ask him what Akanon
> repoped as...
>
> Phizn
> Mith Marr
>
> PS A dark elf once told me that Akanon is really a brownie that has all
> us gnomes fooled...scary thought!
>
